pma:database.name: sql3203681
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `Titles` ( `isbn` char(13) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `editionNumber` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `year` char(4) DEFAULT NULL, `publisherID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `price` decimal(8,2) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`isbn`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
